quick sample size calculation for microarray experi-
ments while controlling FDR. In this paper, we intro-
duce the R package ssize.fdr which implements the
package can be applied for designing one-sample,
two-sample, or multi-sample experiments. The prac-
titioner defines the desired power, the level of FDR
to control, the proportion of non-differentially ex-
pressed genes, as well as effect size and variance.
More specifically, the effect size and variance can be
set as fixed or random quantities coming from appro-
priate distributions. Based on user-defined parame-
ters, this package creates plots of power vs. sample
size. These plots allow for visualization of trade-offs
between power and sample size, in addition to the
